image 400 400
clear 50 50 150
color 255 255 0
circle 30 50 50
fill 50 50 255 255 0
color 50 255 50
line 0 200 100 100
line 100 100 170 240
line 170 240 300 90
line 300 90 399 170
fill 300 300 0 200 0
color 255 255 0
rect 40 300 100 70
fill 41 301 255 255 0
color 200 50 50
polygon 3 30 300 150 300 90 270
save esp2.ppm
